sub_title: Director International Sustainable Agriculture Programs, Food and Agriculture Division
summary: Experienced Owner with a demonstrated history of working in the food production industry. Skilled in ISO Standards, Auditing, GMP, ISO 22000, and Quality Assurance. Strong business development professional with a Master of Business Administration (M.B.A.) focused in Integrated Management on Quality, Safety and Environment from Universidad de Viña del Mar.
